nodes.description: 周一在卡拉奇针对什叶派游行的自杀式爆炸造成至少40人死亡
nodes.support_text: The attack was the second this week in Pakistan to inflict major civilian casualties following Monday's suicide bombing in Karachi targeting a Shiite procession which left at least 40 people dead.

nodes.description: 周五在巴基斯坦Lakki Marwat地区男子排球场发生自杀式汽车炸弹袭击，致75死60伤
nodes.support_text: A suicide car bomb exploded Friday in the middle of a group of men playing volleyball in northwest Pakistan, killing 75 and wounding 60, district police officials told CNN.

nodes.description: 周五上午8:50在North Waziristan发生疑似美军无人机导弹袭击，造成4人死亡
nodes.support_text: Earlier Friday in the nearby district of North Waziristan, a suspected U.S. drone attack killed four people, a Pakistani intelligence official said.

nodes.description: 周五上午10:00在Bajaur agency发生遥控爆炸事件，造成5名平民死亡
nodes.support_text: A remote-controlled explosive struck a car and killed five civilians, according to a representative from the Frontier Corps and a political administration official. It happened around 10 a.m. in the Salar Zar subdivision, in the Bajaur agency of the North West Frontier Province.

nodes.description: 警长认为超过600磅炸药被使用
nodes.support_text: 警长认为超过600磅炸药被使用
语义描述：军方清剿激进分子；主体：the military；对象：militants
语义描述：激进分子威胁社区；主体：militants；对象：threats

nodes.description: 导弹向载有武装分子的汽车发射
nodes.support_text: 导弹向载有武装分子的汽车发射

edges.support_text: The attack was the second this week in Pakistan to inflict major civilian casualties following Monday's suicide bombing in Karachi targeting a Shiite procession which left at least 40 people dead.
It happened around 10 a.m. in the Salar Zar subdivision, in the Bajaur agency of the North West Frontier Province.
Earlier Friday in the nearby district of North Waziristan, a suspected U.S. drone attack killed four people, a Pakistani intelligence official said.
